document.discussion_title: BenIreland published Police appeal for missing 15-year-old girl Bethany McIntyre
document.topic_text: Police appeal for missing 15-year-old girl Bethany McIntyre By BenIreland | Posted: August 22, 2016 0 COMMENTS SHARES Police appeal for missing 15-year-old girl Bethany McIntyre X Copy link to paste in your message / Police officers concerned for the safety of a missing 15-year-old girl have launched an appeal to help bring her home. Bethany McIntyre, 15, isfrom the Lenton area and was last seen on Sunday morning (August 21). She is described as white, of slim build and around 5ft 3ins tall. She has long, brown curly hair and brown eyes. Read more: Police watching 14 convicted knife carriers in crack down She was last seen wearing black leggings, a green t-shirt, a black jacket and a black bag. Officers from Nottinghamshire Police are concerned for Bethany's welfare and would urge anyone with knowledge of her whereabouts to call 101.
